# CodeGlyphX
Version: 1.0.0
Package: CodeGlyphX
API types: 309

Install:
- dotnet add package CodeGlyphX

Quickstart (C#):
```csharp
using CodeGlyphX;

// Generate a QR code
QR.Save("https://example.com", "qr.png");

// Generate a barcode
Barcode.Save(BarcodeType.Code128, "PRODUCT-123", "barcode.png");

// Decode an image
if (QrImageDecoder.TryDecodeImage(imageBytes, out var result))
{
    Console.WriteLine(result.Text);
}
```

Machine-friendly API data (no HTML parsing required):
- /api/index.json
- /api/search.json
- /api/types/{slug}.json

Slug rule: lower-case, dots and symbols become dashes. Example: CodeGlyphX.QR -> codeglyphx-qr
Generated from XML docs during the website build (Build/Build-Website.ps1).
